ProductInfo.Features:
FREE 19" Wide Screen LED Monitor Included In The Package.
6 Cameras: 3* outdoor/indoor 700 TV lines cameras,1/3" Exview HAD CCD II with Effio-E DSP Devices, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 42pcs IR LED, 115 ft IR Distance, WDR(Wide Dynamic Range), OSD Menu, Vandal proof & water proof; 3* indoor 1/3" Effio CCD Camera, 700 TV lines, 2.8~12mm varifocal lens, 36pcs IR LED, 98 ft IR Distance, WDR(Wide Dynamic Range), OSD Menu, Metal vandal proof.
8 Channel H.264 960H & D1 Realtime DVR with 2TB HDD, supports HDMI & VGA outputs. 960×480 & 30FPS real time recording.
iPhone/Android Viewable, Network live, backup, playback, USB2.0 Backup, PTZ Control.
1 Year Warranty and Free Life Time Tech Support.
ProductInfo.Name: GW High End CCTV Surveillance Security Camera System, FREE LED Monitor,8 Channel DVR 2TB HDD 960H & D1 Realtime Recording+Playback, 6 Effio CCD Camera 700 TVL 2.8~12mm VariFocal Lens, iPhone Android Viewable
